list.abs: culture stone is bibulous rate is low , -proof , not easy and efflorescent , sound-absorbing the effect is good , adornment sex is very strong , basically use at sitting room adornment .文化石吸水率低，耐酸，不易风化，吸音效果好，装饰性很强，主要用于客厅装饰。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in the sense 'absorbent'): from Latin bibulus 'freely or readily drinking' (from bibere 'to drink') + -ous

means.word_mean: 1. given to or marked by the consumption of alcohol;

sentences.sentence: "two drunken gentleman holding each other up"
